options.label: Reset and remove from Z-Wave network
Reset configuration parameters to default values

metadata.inclusion:
a) Set the Z-Wave network main controller into adding mode.
b) Power cycle once for the led bulb(OFF->ON).The led bulb will flash once when it has been include into the network.
metadata.exclusion:
a) Set the Z-Wave network main controller into removing mode.
b) Power cycle once for the led bulb(OFF->ON).Then the led bulb will flash once then dim to 5%,when it has been excluded outside the network.
metadata.reset:
Led bulb re-power 6 times (between 0.5-2 seconds each time); If the 6th power on, the led bulb flashes twice (first time: red to green to blue gradient transition, second time: 2700K), which means that the resetting is successful.
NOTE:
Using this action in case of the primary controller is missing or inoperable.
